summary.p: Abstract result returned by a search query. Use pattern matching to handle specific instances of this type.
Can be either one of the following:

member.summary: Duration of time for which the caption is displayed.

member.remarks: May be empty because not all captions have parts.

member.summary: Gets the caption part displayed at the specified point in time, relative to the caption's own offset.

member.summary: Maximum established height of the video stream. Actual height can vary.

member.name: P:YoutubeExplode.Videos.Streams.VideoQuality.Framerate
member.summary: Video stream framerate (in frames per second).

member.name: P:YoutubeExplode.Videos.Streams.VideoQuality.IsHighDefinition
member.summary: Whether this is a high definition video quality (i.e. 1080p or above).
